message.body: I'm sorry I feel terrible. Terrible u had to deal with me from ny, terrible you had to wake up early, terrible u had to sit in the rain! I really had the best time and thank you for having me.
Haha thank you for coming! I just felt like a bad host and needed re assurance - didn't mean to make you cry though lol
It's easy to make me cry. U didn't do that. It just happens.
And honestly if I didn't trust you I would have taken an Amtrak
I wouldn't have gone all the way to the mall if you weren't coming with me!
But please don't think you forced me into anything.
I know your sh
Shopping for shoes, but I really don't know what I did to make you feel that way. I really never want to make you feel that way again.
If its just Friday stuff I'm so sorry I was a bitch. But I'm going to try to be more pAtient, especially when it comes to traveling next time I visit you.
Lol you don't have to be more patient- everyone ever has found trav
And I'm Waiting for the bus and going home and sleeping
eling w me frustrating it's not you
It's me. I dont plan/schedule and then am always surprised to reali
ze that other people def want that and then I feel bad
I just felt bad bc I felt like a bad host but now I know I wasn't !
Of course you werent I love the way you plan! I think ur perfect the way u r!
Lololol I <3 you too. The bus is way worse without you
Aww next time I'm taking care of you. No matter who is hosting who.
I'm taking you for too much sushi
Dude this bus would be really fun with you
FYI just got off the bus in Philly. I'm totally lost at thirtieth station. Can't find blue line. Ended up in the landmark Center still trying to find my way out
So I'm not crazy
I get lost all the time b
And I hate it because its still cold and wet out.
I literally have to walk all around thirtieth street station because I'm an idiot.
So please don't think I asked bc of you. I asked bc of me.
Clearly I'm Incompetent. Not crazy. Just incompetent.
Lolol
I get lost too it's ok. I think the diff is you still feel like you can work to mitigate it, while I have just accepted that I will be lost all the time
and eventually everything magically works out
And you only hate the things About me that I learned from my mom
Eventually as you influence me more than my mother I will end up more like you
Im way more far gone than you :)
No dude you're mom is right
*your
Maybe she should give me some pointers or something
Well she is like an hour early for everything n
And guess what !
She still fucks up sometimes
Did I ever tell u about the Costa Rica trip?
And when I say hour I mean an hour before she plans to be there.
Lol
I'm always late but I also don't care
I Do care if your late tho!!
I'm just glad you made it back in one piece
